attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view that the Prime Ministers' announcement that he is prepared to consider cutting the UK’s fleet of Trident missile-carrying submarines as part of a global agreement to reduce nuclear arms. We urge him to provide greater leadership and go further by abandoning the UK's preparations to develop weapons of mass destruction. Cancel plans for a new nuclear weapons system to replace Trident. Do something beautiful, give a precious gift to the coming generation, please stop the madness of developing weapons that we could never justify the use of.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
